data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Udon Thani, Thailand.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Udon Thani, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Udon Thani, Thailand to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 154 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Udon Thani access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Udon Thani. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the South Asian, Bengali-speaking people might believe through him.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Udon Thani to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, help 293 new simple churches start among the 1,467,200 people in the state of Udon Thani, Thailand. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 9,487 believers in Udon Thani to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

location.name: Udon Thani
location.cities_list: Udon Thani, Ban Phan Don, Kut Chap, Ban Nong Wua So, Ban Dung
location.cities_list_w_pop: Udon Thani (247,231), Ban Phan Don (29,211), Kut Chap (24,696), Ban Nong Wua So (21,722), Ban Dung (19,479)
